author: Source: San Gabriel Valley Tribune
title: a Steve Jobsa biopic looks at the icon behind the machines - San Gabriel Valley Tribune
text:
Academy AwardÆ-winning director/producer DANNY BOYLE and Academy Award-winning writer AARON SORKIN on the set of "Steve Jobs". Set backstage in the minutes before three iconic product launches spanning Jobs' careeróbeginning with the Macintosh in 1984, and ending with the unveiling of the iMac in 1998óthe film takes us behind the scenes of the digital revolution to paint an intimate portrait of the brilliant man at its epicenter.
Start the conversation, or Read more at San Gabriel Valley Tribune.
